judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Mandarino, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Judgment is vacated and the record is remanded to the trial Court for further consideration of the post-trial motions filed in that Court in light of Commonwealth v. Futch, 447 Pa. 389, 290 A. 2d 417 (1972).
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: J. Graham Bale, Jr., Assistant Public Defender, with him John J. Dean, Assistant Public Defender, and George E. Boss, Public Defender, for appellant.
Robert L. Campbell, Assistant District Attorney, with him Carol Mary Los, Assistant District Attorney, and Robert W. Duggan, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Jones, Appellant.
Argued September 26, 1972.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Mandarino, JJ.
J. Graham Bale, Jr., Assistant Public Defender, with him John J. Dean, Assistant Public Defender, and George E. Boss, Public Defender, for appellant.
Robert L. Campbell, Assistant District Attorney, with him Carol Mary Los, Assistant District Attorney, and Robert W. Duggan, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
October 4, 1972:
